alert.note: Alert for Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 14 at 2:27PM MDT until March 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Magic Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing and drifting snow is expected to locally reduce visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur between midnight and 6 AM MDT Wednesday as a cold front crosses the region. Rain will change over to snow Wednesday morning, posing additional travel hazards.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
